channel.title: Link to Auxy Disco forum from Help?
channel.description:
Just a suggestion: Wouldn't it be nice (yes, that *is* a shoutout to Brian Wilson ü§ì one of the greatest producers ever) if there was a link to this friendly, helpful forum, in Auxy's Help section? (Settings > Help) ?
Some new users may not be aware of the forum. It's a great help source, IMO. Not to be missed!

item.title: Link to Auxy Disco forum from Help?

item.description:
I think it used to be settings or help or something and the decision was made to label it subscription
